# Masarmkt2030 - AI & Digital Marketing Company in Saudi Arabia

> مسار للتسويق - شركة رائدة في حلول الذكاء الاصطناعي والتسويق الرقمي في المملكة العربية السعودية

## About Us

Masarmkt2030 is a leading AI solutions and digital marketing company based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. We specialize in WhatsApp chatbots, AI automation, web development, SEO, and comprehensive digital marketing services.

## Contact Information

- **Website**: https://masarmkt2030.online
- **Phone**: +966 53 260 1326
- **WhatsApp**: +966 53 260 1326
- **Email**: info@masarmkt.com
- **Location**: Riyadh, Saudi Arabia

## Services

### AI Chatbots
1. **WhatsApp AI Chatbot** - Automated customer service and sales bot for WhatsApp Business
2. **Instagram AI Chatbot** - DM automation for Instagram business accounts
3. **Facebook Messenger Bot** - Automated responses for Facebook pages

### Web Development
- Next.js & Astro websites
- E-commerce stores
- Landing pages
- Web applications

### Digital Marketing
- SEO (Search Engine Optimization)
- Content Marketing
- Social Media Management
- AI-Powered Marketing Campaigns

### AI Services
- AI Image Generation (Midjourney, DALL-E)
- AI Video Generation (Runway, Sora)
- AI Voice Generation (ElevenLabs)
- AI Video Avatars (HeyGen, Synthesia)
- AI Content Writing
- Data Analytics with AI

## Service Areas (Saudi Cities)

We serve all major cities in Saudi Arabia:
- Riyadh (الرياض)
- Jeddah (جدة)
- Dammam (الدمام)
- Makkah (مكة المكرمة)
- Madinah (المدينة المنورة)
- Khobar (الخبر)
- Taif (الطائف)
- Abha (أبها)
- Tabuk (تبوك)
- Buraidah (بريدة)
- Hofuf (الهفوف)
- Jubail (الجبيل)
- Hail (حائل)
- NEOM
- The Line

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: What is a WhatsApp AI Chatbot?**
A: It's an intelligent automated system that responds to your customers 24/7 on WhatsApp, handles inquiries, showcases products, and can close sales automatically.

**Q: How long does it take to develop a chatbot?**
A: Typically 2-4 weeks depending on complexity and requirements.

**Q: Do you work with small businesses?**
A: Yes! We have solutions for businesses of all sizes, from startups to large enterprises.

**Q: What languages do your bots support?**
A: Our bots support Arabic (including Saudi dialect) and English.

**Q: Do you offer ongoing support?**
A: Yes, we provide 24/7 technical support in Arabic.

- ElevenLabs & HeyGen
